DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective consecutive double-blinded randomize study effect PGI2 , prostacyclin ( epoprostenol , Flolan® ) versus placebo ( saline ) patient severe traumatic brain injury . All patient severe traumatic brain injury eligible inclusion . Inclusion criterion : verify traumatic brain injury , Glasgow Coma Score ( GCS ) intubation sedation ≤ 8 , age 15-70 year , first-recorded cerebral perfusion pressure ( CPP ) > 10 mm Hg , arrival within 24 hour trauma . Tne primary aim evaluate whether treatment epoprostenol would reduce lactate/pyruvate ratio , measure cerebral microdialysis 24 hour treatment . A secondary aim evaluate effect epoprostenol systemic inflammatory marker , measure different cytokine .
